    • Constructor Detail

      • JPlot2DComposite

        public JPlot2DComposite(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent,
                Plot plot)
        Construct a Composite to display the given plot in its center. The plot properties can be safely modified in multiple threads.
        Parameters:
        parent - a widget which will be the parent of the new instance (cannot be null)
        plot - the plot to be display

      • JPlot2DComposite

        public JPlot2DComposite(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent,
                Plot plot,
                boolean threadSafe)
        Construct a Composite to display the given plot in its center.
        Parameters:
        parent - a widget which will be the parent of the new instance (cannot be null)
        plot - the plot to be display
        threadSafe - if false, all plot properties can only be changed within a single thread. if true, all plot properties can be safely changed by multiple threads.

      • JPlot2DComposite

        public JPlot2DComposite(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent,
                RenderEnvironment env)
        Construct a Composite to display a plot in its center. The plot has been assigned to the given RenderEnvironment.
        Parameters:
        parent - a widget which will be the parent of the new instance (cannot be null)
        env - the RenderEnvironment

    • Method Detail

      • getRenderEnvironment

        public RenderEnvironment getRenderEnvironment()
        Return the RenderEnvironment of this JPlot2DComposite. The RenderEnvironment generate plot images and display them in this JPlot2DComposite.
        Returns:
        the RenderEnvironment of this JPlot2DComposite

      • renderingFinished

        public void renderingFinished(RenderingFinishedEvent event)
        Description copied from interface: RenderingFinishedListener
        This method is called by image renderer. The renderer may be asynchronous, so the concurrency must be considered in this method.
        Specified by:
        renderingFinished in interface RenderingFinishedListener
        Parameters:
        event - the event
